LabelAccountDeleteCodeRecoveryGreetingBo: we noticed that you had trouble remembering your delete code. No problem, we are here to help you!
LabelAccountMailChangeGreetingBody: we have received a request to change your email address. To ensure that you have made the change and that your account is still secure, we ask you to confirm the new email address.
LabelAccountPasswordRecoveryGreetingBody: we have received your request to reset your password. Don't worry, we will help you to quickly regain access to your account.
LabelAccountSafeBoxCodeRecoveryGreetingB: we noticed that you had trouble remembering your safebox password. No problem, we are here to help you!
LabelAccountUsernameRecoveryGreetingBody: we noticed that you had trouble remembering your username. No problem, we are here to help you!
LabelMailButtonFallbackLink: If the button does not work, please copy the following link and paste it into your browser's address bar:
LabelMailDoNotReply: Note: This email was created automatically. Please do not reply to this message. If you have any questions or problems, please contact our support.
LabelMailIgnore: If you did not request this email or received it in error, you can simply ignore it.
LabelMailSupportHelp: Do you need help or have questions? Our support team is always there for you.
LabelMailTokenSecurityDuration: For security reasons the link is only valid for the next {{ duration }} hours.
